original_text: The fear and dread of you will fall on all the beasts of the earth, and on all the birds in the sky, on every creature that moves along the ground, and on all the fish in the sea; they are given into your hands.
korean_text: 땅의 모든 짐승과 공중의 모든 새와 땅에 기는 모든 것과 바다의 모든 물고기가 너희를 두려워하며 너희를 무서워하리니 이것들은 너희의 손에 붙였음이니라

sentences.original_text: The fear and dread of you
will fall on all the beasts of the earth
and on all the birds in the sky
on every creature that moves along the ground
and on all the fish in the sea
they are given into your hands
sentences.korean_translation: 이것들이 다 네 손에 붙임을 받았느니라
